data.title: Used Electric Lift Tables 24" x 60"
data.meta-description: Used Electric Lift Tables For Sale at ASI, 24" x 60" platform, electric powered, 4,000 lb. capacity, in stock, American Mfg, learn more about our used electric lift tables

long-description.p: Used Electric Lift Tables For Sale at American Surplus are in stock. These lift tables have a 24" x 60" platform and are electric powered with a foot pedal. They have a two ton, 4,000 lb. capacity. They are made by the manufacturer American. Call our sales team today and learn more about our used electric lift tables.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used lift tables 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
